com.jumio.nv.custom

Interface NetverifyCustomScanInterface


  • public interface NetverifyCustomScanInterface
    Interface for status updates from the custom Netverify scanning view

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NetverifyCustomNfcInterface getNetverifyCustomNfcInterface()
      This function will be called when the NFC scan is getting prepared.
      void onNetverifyCameraAvailable()
      Indicates that the camera preview is available.
      void onNetverifyDisplayBlurHint()
      Notify the user that the image is blurry and therefore can't be taken.
      void onNetverifyExtractionStarted()
      The extraction process started which also indicates that the preview is now stopped
      void onNetverifyFaceInLandscape()
      Face scanning is not possible in landscape orientation.
      void onNetverifyNoUSAddressFound()
      No US Address has been found in the barcode.
      void onNetverifyPrepareScanning()
      Indicates that the SDK is now loading information and a loading indicator should be displayed.
      void onNetverifyPresentConfirmationView(NetverifyConfirmationType confirmationType)
      The NetverifyCustomConfirmationView should be display.
      void onNetverifyScanForPartCanceled(ScanSide scanSide, NetverifyCancelReason cancelReason)
      The scanning for this scanside has been cancelled.
      void onNetverifyScanForPartFinished(ScanSide scanSide, boolean allPartsScanned)
      Indicates that the document part has been successfully scanned.
      void onNetverifyShowLegalAdvice(java.lang.String legalAdvice)
      During the scanning of some ID cards, a legal advice need to be shown.
      void onNetverifyStartNfcExtraction(NetverifyCustomNfcPresenter netverifyCustomNfcPresenter)
      NFC scanning can be started now and can be controlled with the NetverifyCustomNfcPresenter

    • Method Detail

      • onNetverifyCameraAvailable

        void onNetverifyCameraAvailable()
        Indicates that the camera preview is available. It is now safe to check if the camera has a flash and if multiple cameras are available

      • onNetverifyExtractionStarted

        void onNetverifyExtractionStarted()
        The extraction process started which also indicates that the preview is now stopped

      • onNetverifyPrepareScanning

        void onNetverifyPrepareScanning()
        Indicates that the SDK is now loading information and a loading indicator should be displayed. This callback is only triggered if a scanning method requires pre-loading of information

      • onNetverifyPresentConfirmationView

        void onNetverifyPresentConfirmationView(NetverifyConfirmationType confirmationType)
        The NetverifyCustomConfirmationView should be display. It's only possible to call NetverifyCustomScanPresenter.retryScan() or NetverifyCustomScanPresenter.confirmScan()
        Parameters:
        confirmationType - the type of confirmation that should be displayed

      • onNetverifyScanForPartFinished

        void onNetverifyScanForPartFinished(ScanSide scanSide,
                                    boolean allPartsScanned)
        Indicates that the document part has been successfully scanned. Displayed loading indicators should be dismissed
        Parameters:
        scanSide - the scanned side
        allPartsScanned - true if all parts have been scanned

      • onNetverifyNoUSAddressFound

        void onNetverifyNoUSAddressFound()
        No US Address has been found in the barcode. The scan preview will switch to frontside scanning if available. Check for the changed scan mode and help text. Will only be called on a Fastfill scan.

      • onNetverifyFaceInLandscape

        void onNetverifyFaceInLandscape()
        Face scanning is not possible in landscape orientation. Please notify the user accordingly

      • onNetverifyShowLegalAdvice

        void onNetverifyShowLegalAdvice(java.lang.String legalAdvice)
        During the scanning of some ID cards, a legal advice need to be shown.

      • onNetverifyDisplayBlurHint

        void onNetverifyDisplayBlurHint()
        Notify the user that the image is blurry and therefore can't be taken. (Manual image capturing only)

      • onNetverifyScanForPartCanceled

        void onNetverifyScanForPartCanceled(ScanSide scanSide,
                                    NetverifyCancelReason cancelReason)
        The scanning for this scanside has been cancelled. Displayed loading indicators should be dismissed
        Parameters:
        scanSide - the scanned side
        cancelReason - the reason why the scan has been canceled

      • getNetverifyCustomNfcInterface

        NetverifyCustomNfcInterface getNetverifyCustomNfcInterface()
        This function will be called when the NFC scan is getting prepared. If no NFC scan should be done, Null can be returned here.
        Returns:
        instance of NetverifyCustomNfcInterface or null

      • onNetverifyStartNfcExtraction

        void onNetverifyStartNfcExtraction(NetverifyCustomNfcPresenter netverifyCustomNfcPresenter)
        NFC scanning can be started now and can be controlled with the NetverifyCustomNfcPresenter
        Parameters:
        netverifyCustomNfcPresenter -
